dct_title_s: The Kingdome of Persia : with the cheef citties and habites described
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:9,000,000] (E 45째--E 73째/N 49째--N 20째). Relief shown pictorially. Includes views of Spaha, Ormus, Tarvis and Gilan. Includes depictions of social classes and styles of dress. Dimensions: 34 x 44 centimeters
